name: The Mole You Know
description:
Play as our hero as he tries to stop the moles from achieving world domination with a fun little twist.

Originally created for Ludum Dare 29 The Mole You Know has been polished up and ready to be played!
Play the original LD version here.

Version 1.2 is in the works and the following features are planned:

  • Gameplay variety.
  • Alternate mole types with unique abilities.
  • Alternate weapons and environments.
  • Bestiary.
  • Challenges and progression.
  • Unlockables.

Known Bugs:

  • Resume not highlighting on pause menu.
  • Cannot select play again or exit with keyboard on end screen.

I would appreciate any feedback or bugs reports to be sent to chris@mandlebar.com
